Posts.Content: Has anyone heard of the doctor telling you that you don't need chemo after it has spread to the lymph nodes? Spread to the sentinal node and one other node. Doctor said they are confident that they got all the cancer when the did the masectomy and no need for chemo just tomoxifin for 5 years. Worried that it will come back and regret that chemo was not done.\ Thanks for your help
Posts.Title: breast cancer
